Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params._heartbeats: Array with the heartbeat of price feed
params._priceFeeds: Array with the contract address of price feed

params._baseCurrencyDecimals: The decimals of the base currency

params._amount: Amount in the base currency to be converted
params._ccy: Currency that has to be converted from the base currency.

params._amounts: Amounts in the base currency to be converted
params._ccy: Currency that has to be converted to the base currency.
Currency that has to be converted to the base currency.
Currency that has to be converted to the base currency
Currency that has to be converted to the base currency.

returns._0: The boolean if the selected currency is supported or not

initialize(address).details: Function is invoked by the proxy contract when the contract is added to the ProxyController.

params._owner: The address of the contract owner

multicall(bytes[]).details: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._heartbeats: Array with the heartbeat of price feed
params._priceFeeds: Array with the contract address of price feed

BASE_CURRENCY_DECIMALS.details: Used for decimals of the base currency

addCurrency(bytes32,uint8,uint256,addres.notice: Adds new currency into the protocol and links with existing price feed.

convert(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).notice: Gets the converted amount of currency.

convert(bytes32,bytes32,uint256[]).notice: Gets the converted amounts of currency.

convertFromBaseCurrency(bytes32,uint256).notice: Gets the converted amount to the selected currency from the base currency.

convertFromBaseCurrency(bytes32,uint256[.notice: Gets the converted amounts to the selected currency from the base currency.

convertToBaseCurrency(bytes32,int256).notice: Gets the converted amount in the base currency.

convertToBaseCurrency(bytes32,uint256).notice: Gets the converted amount in the base currency.

convertToBaseCurrency(bytes32,uint256[]).notice: Gets the converted amounts in the base currency.

currencyExists(bytes32).notice: Gets if the selected currency is supported.

getAggregatedLastPrice(bytes32).notice: Gets the last price of the selected currency in the base currency. This price is returned in the aggregated decimals of all price feeds.

getDecimals(bytes32).notice: Gets aggregated and cached decimals of the price feeds for the selected currency.

getHaircut(bytes32).notice: Gets haircut ratio for the selected currency. Haircut is used in bilateral netting cross-calculation.

getLastPrice(bytes32).notice: Gets the last price of the selected currency in the base currency.

getPriceFeed(bytes32).notice: Gets price feed for the selected currency.

getRevision().notice: Gets the revision number of the contract

removeCurrency(bytes32).notice: Updates the flag indicating if the currency is supported in the protocol.

updateHaircut(bytes32,uint256).notice: Updates the haircut ratio for supported currency

updatePriceFeed(bytes32,uint8,address[],.notice: Update the price feed contract addresses.

userdoc.notice: Implements managing of the supported currencies in the protocol. This contract stores the currency settings and links the currency to the external price feeds. It uses those settings and also has the functions to change prices to other currencies.
